name: ShieldSettings.ActivityCategoryPolicy
desc: Policies available for shielding activities based on their category.

items.name: case none
items.desc: A policy that indicates the device doesnâ€™t shield any content.

items.name: case all(except: Set<Token<Activity>>)
items.desc: A policy that indicates the device shields all apps and websites, except content that you specify.

items.name: case specific(Set<ActivityCategoryToken>, except: Set<Token<Activity>>)
items.desc: A policy that indicates the device shields specific categories of activity, with some exceptions.

items.name: static func == (ShieldSettings.ActivityCategoryPolicy<Activity>, ShieldSettings.ActivityCategoryPolicy<Activity>) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are equal.
